title: Pre-existing type errors blocking build
issue: Build fails due to type error in workbench-client.tsx. RecordingSettings type is missing required properties (rna_timeout_seconds, max_call_duration_minutes) in the initial useState default value. This is a pre-existing issue not related to TKT-034 changes.
suggestion: Add the missing required properties to the RecordingSettings initial state, or make those properties optional in the type definition.
